name: Joseph Clay Miller
body:
I am an app developer with a passion for games and puzzles. I started off as a puzzle maker, then I went on to get a B.S. degree in Game and Simulation Arts & Sciences. I began making games in flash after that. Then I transitioned to developing mobile games and apps. Most recently I have been making web apps.

## Web Games
### Tic-Tac-Toe 
This game is played by 2 players alternating turns. The board automatically resets when the game ends. It is built in JavaScript with jQuery.
[Play the game](http://josephclaymiller.github.io/Tic-Tac-Toe/) or [view the code on GitHub](https://github.com/josephclaymiller/Tic-Tac-Toe).
